summary: Comprehensive testing of Fixed Income Trading & Management Portal module. Backend APIs 95% pass rate. Frontend pages load correctly. Fixed Decimal serialization bug in instrument creation.

minor.issue: Python Decimal objects were not JSON/BSON serializable - FIXED by converting to strings before MongoDB storage

integration_issues.issue: Error toast 'Failed to load instruments/orders' shown briefly on initial navigation before data loads
integration_issues.note: Data loads correctly after token is available

critical_code_review_comments: WebSocket message parsing logs 'Failed to parse WebSocket message' for 'pong' responses - consider adding handling for keep-alive messages
seed_data_creation: Created test instrument INE002A01018 (HDFC Ltd NCD) for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Fixed Income module fully tested. Market data uses MOCK provider (not real market data). All CRUD operations for instruments, orders, and reports work correctly. Pricing calculations (YTM, Dirty Price, Price from Yield) verified.

mocked_apis.Market Data Service: Uses MockMarketDataProvider - generates simulated quotes with exchange='MOCK'

bug_fixed.issue: Decimal objects not serializable to MongoDB
bug_fixed.fix: Added conversion of Decimal fields to strings before MongoDB insert
